mapper.select: SELECT sb.*,ab.accountbookcode,ab.accountbookname,ab.quota,ab.transferaccountswayid FROM signbill sb INNER JOIN accountbook ab ON sb.accountbookid = ab.accountbookid where sb.accountid = #{accountid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
